title: [Large-scale] Foundational Bioinformatics Education for Medicine: Applying Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Blended online-offline learning environment utilizing digital devices, with project execution based on clinical cases

learning_goals: Learners can interpret clinical sample analysis results using bioinformatics tools (e.g., BLAST, NCBI databases)
Learners can apply statistical analysis results of genomic data to clinical decision-making
Learners can design and validate the fundamental stages of a bioinformatics analysis pipeline

resources: Bioinformatics Analysis Software (Galaxy, UCSC Genome Browser)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
